briefing.headline: The Great Migration Tracking Sabotage
briefing.narrativeHtml:
Wildlife Emergency Alert for Route Runners! Dr. Sahel, ecosystem specialist of the Sourdough Syndicate's 'Grasslands & Transitions Division,' has stolen advanced wildlife tracking equipment from conservation research stations across Africa!

His calling card: a bread-slice stamp and the message: 'These migration routes are being DESTROYED while conservationists lie! My ECOSYSTEM PROTOCOL will expose the wildlife truth they hide from the world!'

Intelligence Report: Dr. Sahel believes conservation organizations suppress data about habitat destruction to maintain funding. He's stealing equipment to create an 'authentic wildlife monitoring network' - but where in the vast African savanna?

suspects.name: Dr. Sahel (Kwame Asante)
suspects.description: Conservation biologist with PhD from University of Oxford. Expert in African savanna ecosystems, wildlife migration patterns, and GPS field research.

rounds.clueHtml: Field Intelligence: 'Dr. Sahel was spotted conducting professional field research in African savanna landscape with distinctive acacia trees, using GPS devices and field notebooks to document coordinates. He's wearing multi-pocket field vest and using systematic data collection methods while studying the golden grassland ecosystem around research vehicles.'

rounds.explainHtml: Field Research Confirmed: African savanna ecosystem! This distinctive grassland environment with scattered acacia trees provides ideal habitat for wildlife research. rounds.clueHtml:
